alert.note: Alert for Lower Treasure Valley; Upper Treasure Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 3:08PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Ada, northeastern Canyon and south central Gem Counties through 345 PM MDT... At 308 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Caldwell, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Nampa around 310 PM MDT. Star around 320 PM MDT. Meridian, Eagle and Firebird Speedway around 330 PM MDT. Boise, Garden City and Hidden Springs around 340 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Lower Treasure Valley; Upper Treasure Valley
